title: In The Zeits 6/21: NBA, National Selfie Day, Shohei Ohtani, Disneyland, Olympics
itunes:title: In The Zeits 6/21: NBA, National Selfie Day, Shohei Ohtani, Disneyland, Olympics
description:
In this edition of In The Zeits, Jack and Miles discuss NBA news, National Selfie Day, the UNSTOPPABLE Shohei Ohtani, Disneylands' pricey reopening, and the nightmarish juggernaut that is the Olympics

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
